files.name: form-description.svelte
files.content:
<script>
	import * as FormPrimitive from "@huntabyte/fsnap";
	import { cn } from "$lib/utils";
	let className = undefined;
	export { className as class };
</script>

<FormPrimitive.Description
	class={cn("text-[0.8rem] text-muted-foreground", className)}
	{...$$restProps}
	let:descriptionAttrs
>
	<slot {descriptionAttrs} />
</FormPrimitive.Description>

files.name: form-element-field.svelte
form-field-errors.svelte
files.content:
{#each errors as error}
{error}
{/each}

files.name: form-field.svelte
form-fieldset.svelte
files.content:
<script lang="ts" context="module"></script>

<script lang="ts" generics="T extends Record<string, unknown>, U extends FormPath<T>">
	import * as FormPrimitive from "@huntabyte/fsnap";
	import { cn } from "$lib/utils";
	export let form;
	export let name;
	let className = undefined;
	export { className as class };
</script>

<FormPrimitive.Fieldset
	{form}
	{name}
	let:constraints
	let:errors
	let:tainted
	let:value
	class={cn("space-y-2", className)}
>
	<slot {constraints} {errors} {tainted} {value} />
</FormPrimitive.Fieldset>

files.name: form-label.svelte
files.content:
<script>
	import { getFormControl } from "@huntabyte/fsnap";
	import { cn } from "$lib/utils";
	import { Label } from "@/registry/new-york/ui/label";
	let className = undefined;
	export { className as class };
	const { labelAttrs } = getFormControl();
</script>

<Label {...$labelAttrs} class={cn("data-[fs-error]:text-destructive", className)} {...$$restProps}>
	<slot {labelAttrs} />
</Label>

files.name: form-legend.svelte
files.content:
<script>
	import * as FormPrimitive from "@huntabyte/fsnap";
	import { cn } from "$lib/utils";
	let className = undefined;
	export { className as class };
</script>

<FormPrimitive.Legend
	{...$$restProps}
	class={cn("text-sm font-medium leading-none data-[fs-error]:text-destructive", className)}
	let:legendAttrs
>
	<slot {legendAttrs} />
</FormPrimitive.Legend>
